Author: FancyDoughnuts
Text: It will pass. The urge will go away if only you wait. Go for a walk. Watch shit on tv. Draw. Do whatever you can to keep your mind busy. When you feel like you can’t take it anymore, it will suddenly start going down. I promise. And if you do give in. It’s okay. We’ve all been there. Just start over again :) the universe is rooting for you.

Author: K0B3ryant
Text: I want to float out this idea that relapsing is a constant, conscious decision just as much as recovery is.    I know it’s fucking hard. I know it hurts and you’re tired but giving in won’t make you feel better. Your brain is fighting against itself but I truly believe in you.
